tables.name: accounts
tables.comment: Twitterなどのアカウントテーブル

columns.name: type
columns.comment: アカウントのハードコードID

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `accounts` (
  `id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL,
  `url` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `check` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `fk_users_accounts` (`user_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_users_accounts` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: contests

columns.name: link
columns.comment: コンテスト情報のリンク

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `contests` (
  `id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `link` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `since` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `until` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: contest_teams
tables.comment: コンテスト参加チームテーブル

columns.name: link
columns.comment: コンテストチームの詳細が載っているページへのリンク

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: コンテストチーム作成日時

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: コンテストチーム更新日時

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `contest_teams` (
  `id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `contest_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `result` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `link` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `fk_contest_teams_contest` (`contest_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_contest_teams_contest` FOREIGN KEY (`contest_id`) REFERENCES `contests` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: contest_team_user_belongings
tables.comment: コンテストチームとユーザー関係テーブル

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル作成日時

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル更新日時

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `contest_team_user_belongings` (
  `team_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `user_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`team_id`,`user_id`),
  KEY `fk_contest_team_user_belongings_user` (`user_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_contest_team_user_belongings_contest_team` FOREIGN KEY (`team_id`) REFERENCES `contest_teams` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_contest_team_user_belongings_user` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: event_level_relations
tables.comment: knoQイベントと公開レベルの関係テーブル

columns.name: level
columns.comment: 公開レベル。0なら匿名、1ならそのまま公開、2なら外部に非公開

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル作成日時

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル更新日時

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `event_level_relations` (
  `id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `level` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: groups
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `groups` (
  `group_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `link` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`group_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: group_user_admins
tables.comment: グループと管理者関係テーブル

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル作成日時

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル更新日時

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `group_user_admins` (
  `user_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `group_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`,`group_id`),
  KEY `fk_group_user_admins_group` (`group_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_group_user_admins_group` FOREIGN KEY (`group_id`) REFERENCES `groups` (`group_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: group_user_belongings
tables.comment: グループとユーザー関係テーブル

columns.name: since_semester
columns.comment: ユーザー所属開始学期(0:前期 1:後期)

columns.name: until_semester
columns.comment: ユーザー所属終了学期(0:前期 1:後期)

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル作成日時

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: 関係テーブル更新日時

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `group_user_belongings` (
  `user_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `group_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `since_year` smallint(4) NOT NULL,
  `since_semester` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `until_year` smallint(4) NOT NULL,
  `until_semester` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`,`group_id`),
  KEY `fk_group_user_belongings_group` (`group_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_group_user_belongings_group` FOREIGN KEY (`group_id`) REFERENCES `groups` (`group_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_group_user_belongings_user` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: migrations
tables.comment: gormigrate用のデータベースバージョンテーブル
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `migrations` (
  `id` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: projects
tables.comment: プロジェクトテーブル

columns.name: link
columns.comment: プロジェクト情報のリンク

columns.name: since_semester
columns.comment: プロジェクト開始学期(0:前期 1:後期)

columns.name: until_semester
columns.comment: プロジェクト終了学期(0:前期 1:後期)

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: プロジェクト作成日時

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: プロジェクト更新日時

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `projects` (
  `id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `link` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `since_year` smallint(4) NOT NULL,
  `since_semester` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `until_year` smallint(4) NOT NULL,
  `until_semester` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: project_members
tables.comment: プロジェクト所属者テーブル

columns.name: since_year
columns.comment: プロジェクト所属開始年

columns.name: since_semester
columns.comment: プロジェクト所属開始学期(0:前期 1:後期)

columns.name: until_year
columns.comment: プロジェクト所属終了年

columns.name: until_semester
columns.comment: プロジェクト所属終了学期(0:前期 1:後期)

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `project_members` (
  `project_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `user_id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `since_year` smallint(4) NOT NULL,
  `since_semester` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `until_year` smallint(4) NOT NULL,
  `until_semester` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`project_id`,`user_id`),
  KEY `fk_project_members_user` (`user_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_project_members_project` FOREIGN KEY (`project_id`) REFERENCES `projects` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_project_members_user` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

tables.name: users

columns.name: check
columns.comment: 氏名を公開するかどうかの可否 (0: 停止, 1: 有効, 2: 一時停止)

columns.name: state
columns.comment: traQのユーザーアカウント状態

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` char(36) NOT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `check` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `display_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `state` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_at` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uni_users_name` (`name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
